name: Shmup (itch) (msfew)
description:
You are a cowboy. The cows are killing each other with knives. You need to kill them first, before they kill themselves first.

Instruction:

Press "SPACE" to shoot.

Press "WASD" to move.

Boots make you move faster. But, you can only wear one!

Milk make you shoot more bullets. But, you are lactose intolerance, and cannot drink more than one.

Tricks:

Don't rush to kill cows at first phase. Wait then shoot so that the items will be dropped near you.

Credits:

Music: https://pixabay.com/music/id-109318/

Cowboy sprite: https://www.deviantart.com/fantasyrebel/art/Cowboy-Sprite-541044602

Cow sprite: https://legendarywars.fandom.com/wiki/Cow

Milk sprite: https://es.pixilart.com/art/who-wants-milk-df052891fd222e1

Boots sprite: http://pixelartmaker.com/art/920bb2ea34df485

Cow sound: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/cow/

Gun sound: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/gun/
